title.narrative: Strengthening Preparedness and Critical Emergency Infrastructure Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to enhance the resilience of Romanian Gendarmerie Facilities that are critical to respond to Emergency Situations and disasters and to strengthen the institutional capacities for emergency preparedness and response.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
Ministry of Internal Affairs (General Inspectorate of the Romanian Gendarmerie)
Romania (through its Ministry of Public Finance)

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA

description.narrative: Total Disbursement in First Quarter of 2022

provider-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

title.narrative: Emergency response buildings which have been retrofitted to enhance resilience
Grievances responded to within stipulated time
Reconstructed or retrofitted emergency response buildings which have added or enhanced gender responsive design features
Share of trained Gendarmerie personnel with newly acquired skills and emergency response equipment participating in operational interventions
Gendarmerie personnel with access to new emergency response equipment
Number of communities reached through informative community meetings
Reconstructed or retrofitted emergency response buildings which have design features for universal access
Gendarmerie personnel with access to resilient emergency response buildings
Emergency response buildings which have been reconstructed with enhanced resilience
Direct project beneficiaries served by Gendarmerie personnel in resilient emergency response buildings
Gendarmerie personnel who have received training in emergency response
Capacity of the Gendarmerie to plan risk reduction investments strengthened
Institutional capacity in place for project implementation
